net.corda.core.contracts.clauses

Class AllComposition<S extends ContractState,C extends CommandData,K>

  • Clause
    • CompositeClause
      • AllOf
        • net.corda.core.contracts.clauses.AllComposition<S,C,K>
  • Deprecated.

    public class AllComposition<S extends ContractState,C extends CommandData,K>
extends AllOf

    Compose a number of clauses, such that all of the clauses must run for verification to pass.
